title: League client loading issues
body:
Ever since this 6:00 PM today I started having trouble opening the league client.
When I open it the big "League of Legends" name pops up in the middle, then nothing happens.
I have never had this problem before and I have changed no settings, nothing and it won't work.
The client worked fine before but not I cant open it, please help.
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: It almost sounds like your OS might actually be blocking League from opening. That can happen if you aren't running it as admin or have the right permissions settings in place. Follow our [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be able to get the client working again.
